relproducts.title: Florence Coral - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The beauty of florence coral is that it allows you to see something subtly different every time you look at it. There are so many different shades of green and pink working together, that you really get the feel that the fabric has a life and soul all of its own. When you want to work coral into your decor, you need to be bold with your use of shape and form. Striking country artwork that immediately catches the eye, and a rug in front of the log burner would make for welcome additions.

relproducts.title: Florence Mustard - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Florence mustard gets its name from the tangy yellow that sits in the background, but this is a design that offers far more than that. The artistic nature of the florals gives the fabric a beautiful sketched quality that instantly captures the imagination. Imagine all of the new creative avenues this opens up for your next home interiors project. If you want to be able to start the day with a smile, use mustard in the bedroom.

relproducts.title: Verona Prime 25mm Titanium Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A stylish grey tone, this titanium perfect fit venetian blind adds a bold grey shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.
